articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Rohit, Kohli missing T20Is again: What it means for their future in the format - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Both, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, were not named in India's T20I squad for the upcoming three-match series against South Africa.  | Cricket
articles.content: On Thursday, the BCCI announced squads for Team India's upcoming tour of South Africa, that comprises three ODIs, as many T20Is, and two Tests. While the major takeaway from the squads was the rest g… [+4131 chars]
